title: Stiletto
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Behaviorism (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Footwear
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sexual attraction
description: 'Stiletto' is an intriguing investigation of society's fascination with fetishistic footwear. The impact of the stiletto heel on both fashion and culture is scrutinised from a number of perspectives by people including an historian, a podiatrist, a fashion therapist, a fashion designer, and the manufacturers of fetishistic shoes. Looks at stilettos in relation to roleplay, festishism, gender roles, foot- binding, and images of sexuality, using archival footage and photo- graphic stills as supporting evidence.
